mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, USERNAME, SHOPNAME, EVALUATE, LOCATION, DAYONLINE, YESTONLINE, WEEKONLINE, MONTHONLINE, CREDIT, KEYFLAG, SALSENUM, SALSEMONEY, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, STATUS, SELLPRICE, TRANSLATRATE, FEEDBACKSCORE from db_competitor where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, USERNAME, SHOPNAME, EVALUATE, LOCATION, DAYONLINE, YESTONLINE, WEEKONLINE, MONTHONLINE, CREDIT, KEYFLAG, SALSENUM, SALSEMONEY, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, STATUS, SELLPRICE, TRANSLATRATE, FEEDBACKSCORE from db_competitor
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , USERNAME , SHOPNAME , EVALUATE , LOCATION , DAYONLINE , YESTONLINE , WEEKONLINE , MONTHONLINE , CREDIT , KEYFLAG , SALSENUM , SALSEMONEY , OPER , OPERTIME , CORPID , OPENFLAG , STATUS , SELLPRICE , TRANSLATRATE , FEEDBACKSCORE

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
EVALUATE = #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
DAYONLINE = #{dayonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
YESTONLINE = #{yestonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
WEEKONLINE = #{weekonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
MONTHONLINE = #{monthonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
KEYFLAG = #{keyflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SALSENUM = #{salsenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SALSEMONEY = #{salsemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
TRANSLATRATE = #{translatrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FEEDBACKSCORE = #{feedbackscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
and 1=1

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
SHOPNAME = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
EVALUATE = #{evaluate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
DAYONLINE = #{dayonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
YESTONLINE = #{yestonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
WEEKONLINE = #{weekonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
MONTHONLINE = #{monthonline,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
CREDIT = #{credit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
KEYFLAG = #{keyflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SALSENUM = #{salsenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SALSEMONEY = #{salsemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
SELLPRICE = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
TRANSLATRATE = #{translatrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ,
FEEDBACKSCORE = #{feedbackscore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
, 1=1
